name: Deanites
declaringWar: Resistance is futile! Prepare to be assimilated!
attacked: You want to play? Very funny!
defeated: How is it possible that those Apes hurt us? The galactic senate will take care of them.
introduction: As superior galactic entities, you are not worthy of our attention.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
uniques: [+1 Gold, +1 Production, +1 Food, +1 Culture, +1 Faith, +1 Science] [in all cities]
[+1 Gold, +1 Production, +1 Food, +1 Culture, +1 Faith, +1 Science] in cities on [Snow] tiles
[+400]% Production towards any buildings that already exist in the Capital
[+75]% Production when constructing [All] wonders [in all cities]
[-75]% Gold cost of acquiring tiles [in all cities]
[+75]% Strength <when fighting units from a Civilization with more Cities than you>
Receive triple Gold from Barbarian encampments and pillaging Cities
[-75]% Culture cost of adopting new Policies
